meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Vote to Approve the January 13th, 2025 Youth Commission (YC) Meeting Minutes
Presentation by City of Dallas: Teens Organized and Prepared for Success briefing
agenda_items.description: The manager for TOPS, Vernon Pellum will present to the commission on the Teens Organized and Prepared for Success Program. They will also address their partnership with the youth commission and how this will support the triple threat basketball game and future events.

agenda_items.title: Presentation by City of Dallas: Welcoming Communities briefing
agenda_items.description: Shpendim Nadzaku, welcoming coordinator, will provide a briefing regarding the City of Dallas WCIA office, their programming, and their response to current events.

agenda_items.title: YC wide retreat update
agenda_items.description: Chair Hawkins will provide an update on the ongoing action and next steps for the Youth Commission wide retreat.

agenda_items.title: Environmental Committee task update
agenda_items.description: Commissioner Moreno will provide an update on the activities of the Environmental Committee, including stream team certifications and earth day activities with Dallas Arboretum.

agenda_items.title: Triple Threat Basketball game update
agenda_items.description: Commissioner Nelson will provide an update on the Triple Threat basketball game including what arrangements have been made and what support will be needed from the commission.

keywords: Teens Organized and Prepared for Success
